titleStmt.title: A copy of Admiral Russel's letter to the Earl of Nottingham Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Orford, Edward Russell, Earl of, 1653-1727.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones in the Savoy,

notesStmt.note: Dated: May 20. 1692. Cape-Barfleur, S.W. distance 7 leagues.
Includes: Some particulars of another letter from the fleet.
In this edition, the first line of title reads: "A copy of Admiral Russel's".
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
